name: To E.D.E.N
description:
After having their power suddenly restored, robots Kyo and Jiki find themselves in a crumbling world. Their only hope to survive is to find what is known to them as "Project E.D.E.N", a safe haven built to protect and nurture both robot-kind and a dying world. 

The player must use Jiki and Kyo’s individual abilities to traverse and solve puzzles before their world turns completely against them. Each puzzle solved is another step taken on their journey to their destination, Project E.D.E.N.
